posts.post_content:
Posted By: Patrick McMenemy
Since my progress on PCL E-cards is at a stand-still, I figured I'd troll for some 1911 Obak catchers. I'm interested in Ex or better examples without creases. 

Some of the ones I'm looking for include: La Longe,  Mitze, Pearce, H. Smith, and Schmidt.

I already have: Abbott, Berry, Grindle, Kuhn, Murray, Sheehan, Spencer, Tiedeman, and Thomas.

I can purchase outright or I have a ton of items to trade.

Thanks,

Patrick

Posted By: Patrick McMenemy
Since my progess on E136s, both Home Run Kisses and Zeenuts have stalled, I thought I should add some more catchers in the Obak set.

Here is the list of catchers I still need as far as I know:

Brown (Vernon)
Dashwood
Hasty
Hogan
LaLonge
Mitze
Pearce
Ryan (San Francisco)
Schmidt
Shea
H. Smith
Spiesman

I'm interested in Ex or better examples without creases.
Stamps and writing on back of the card is O.K.

Thanks,

Patrick

Posted By: Patrick McMenemy
I'm eager to add 1911 Obak catchers to my collection. I will pay well for cards I need or have plenty to trade as well.

Thanks,

Patrick

Posted By: paulstratton
I have an SGC 70 Hogan.  Email me if you have any interest.

Posted By: Patrick McMenemy
I'm still looking to trade/buy the following cards in the 1911 Obak set:

Pacific Coast League:

Drummond Brown
Tom Hasty
William "Hap" Hogan (Portrait)
Mickey LaLonge
Carl Mitze
Duckey Pearce
Walt Schmidt
Walter Ryan (S.F.)

Thanks,

Patrick
